page.title: 18GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: MELBOURNE CHILDREN PLAY A MIXTURE OF GAMES,OLD AND NEW.WE HAVE PLAYGROUND GAMES,WHICH CAN BE DIVIDED INTO RUNNING GAMES,CATCH AND SKIPPING GAMES;TEAM GAMES,LIKE FOOTBALL,NETBALL CRICKET AND ROUNDERS.HERE IS ONE OF OUR FAVOURITE SKIPPING RHYMES:- "CINDERELLA,DRESSED IN YELLA, WENT UPSTAIRS TO KISS A FELLA, BY MISTAKE SHE KISSED A SNAKE, HOW MANY KISSES DID SHE TAKE?" THE ANSWER IS HOW MANY TIMES YOU CAN JUMP THE ROPE. TO PLAY BRITISH BULLDOGS YOU HAVE 2 TEAMS AND 2 DENS AT OPPOSITE ENDS OF THE PLAYGROUND.YOU CROSS FROM 1 DEN TO ANOTHER WITHOUT BEING CAUGHT.THOSE WHO ARE CAUGHT JOIN THE OPPOSING TEAM AND BECOME CATCHERS.THE LAST ONE REMAINING UNCAUGHT IS THE WINNER AND BECOMES THE FIRST CATCHER FOR THE NEXT,NEW GAME.
